review_data.content: The price of 26 CHF for the whole menu including a beverage is more than ok for Zurich and the dish was good- especially the spices in the sauce with paneer and the dessert (mango & chia pudding).

review_data.title: A must visit!!

review_data.title: Great ambience and lovely waiters makes this a must go place

review_data.title: You get what you expect
